articles.content:
Swatch stores across the world, from London to Geneva to Hong Kong to Miami, were swarmed on Saturday as the Omega x Swatch Speedmaster MoonSwatch was released in stores.

articles.title: Delayed March update failed to solve connectivity issues for many hopeful Pixel 6 users - PhoneArena
articles.description: Some Pixel 6 series users were holding out hope that the delayed March update would solve their connectivity issues. It did not.
